metadata.ground_truth: According to the reviews I have on hand for this location, the water pressure here is low and could be a lot better.  Sorry to disappoint!

conversation.content: i need a place to stay
Sure, do you have an area you want to stay in?
Yes, I would like to stay in the north.  I need free wifi.  I'd like to stay in a moderately priced guesthouse please.
How about kirkwood house? They are located at 172 chesterton road.
does this hotel have good water pressure?

<think>

</think>

Kirkwood House has a really good water pressure according to one guest, but another guest said that the water pressure was very low.

Thanks for sticking with it. Going back to our north-with-free-wifi plan, Kirkwood House has mixed water-pressure reviews—some guests report good pressure, others low. If reliable pressure matters, would you like me to pull a few other moderately priced north-area options with consistently strong water pressure?
The Alpha-Milton Guest House has reviews that say the water pressure is good. Would you like me to book you a room there?
That sounds great—thanks for checking the water pressure. Please go ahead and book a room at Alpha-Milton Guest House. bye <END>
